lines.speaker: Camarade
text: In this game, you'll need to sneak around without being seen. But first, learn how to move your legs. There's one button for each leg.
Press the left button to move your left leg. Press the right button to move your right leg.
Lets try moving your legs now!

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Well done! Now, you may have noticed that the more you press the button, the more the leg moves forward!
If the leg goes to the maximum forward position, it goes back to its original position.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Also, when you press a button while the opposite button is hold, the leg moves back to its original position.
You need to coordinate both legs to move smoothly.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Let's see how well you can move your legs together. Try to walk to the end of this path in 10 seconds!
The timer starts on your first move!
